entry.title: Sphinx and Push Notifications
entry.summary: In this message, Pavol Rusnak from SatoshiLabs asks two unrelated questions related to lightning network. Firstly, he enquires about whether c-lightning will support Sphinx or any other form of spontaneous payments. Secondly, he asks if a lightning node such as lnd or c-lightning can send push notifications when it receives or routes a payment and if these notifications are cryptographically signed with the node's private key. He also requests for documentation on this feature if it exists.
